reviews.review_msg: Took this in Spring '06. One of the most useful I ever took in quantum mechanics and I owe it mostly to the fact that Dr. Leach was teaching it. He made the material quite clear, and his assignments, while complex, were great starting material for how his exams are structured (which I found ridiculously easy for the most part).

The most dedicated prof I've had in SFU.  Really knows his stuff too! This class is kinda hard for those who don't have any background in Quantum Mechanics, so it is better to take Chem 464, or perhaps Phys 385 first.  He takes a lot of material from Steinfeld's text; make it your bible for the semester and forget buying the required text.
